item.title: Highest level of education helps to understand your political inclination.
item.description: Cesar Y. Villarreal Guzman All the code used in this post can be found here Abstract This investigation builds on existing research that shows a positive correlation between highest level of education and political inclination. We use the Naive Bayes classification method to support the conclusion that at least some university education is correlated with an individual voting for a liberal party and a non-university education to a conservative party.
